summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the business and occupation tax; amending SMC 5.44.010 to add "quarterly period" to definitions and to add the furnishing of lodging to the definition of "sale at retail"; amending SMC 5.44.030 to increase the rate of tax upon certain persons for the privilege of engaging in business activities and to delete the business of furnishing lodging as a separate business classification; repealing SMC 5.44.035 which provided for the levying of an additional tax on such persons in the form of a tax surcharge during 1982: amending SMC 5.44.120 to eliminate the minimum tax beginning January 1, 1983; amending SMC 5.44.130 to eliminate small business license classification and to establish a license fee for separate business locations; amending SMC 5.44.130 and 5.44.140 to increase the business license application fee; and amending SMC 5.44.180 to accelerate penalty periods for delinquent filing of tax returns.
